category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0DefaultRuleDateForContent
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default rule date mode value for the configurator views in Content applications like 4G Designer and Structure manager application. The Valid Values: -Latest= The variability/rules will be loaded as of the current system date and time for the configurator context. -System Default= The variability will be loaded as of the current date and default time (i.e. midnight + offset) for the configurator context. This is the default value
